title: Set Up a Patient Payment Plan
description: A patient calls with a large outstanding balance and is unable to pay it all at once. They want to set up a payment plan.

tasks.description: Identify the patient's account and verify their total outstanding balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the total amount owed by the patient.

tasks.description: Negotiate a monthly payment amount and duration with the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent and patient agree on a monthly payment schedule.

tasks.description: Set up the payment plan in the billing system, which will generate automatic monthly reminders.
tasks.expected_outcome: The payment plan is successfully configured in the system.
